alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:31PM CDT until May 16 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Northern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Greene County in east Tennessee... Central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 631 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morristown, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Greeneville, White Pine, Parrottsville, Mosheim, Caney Branch, Cedar Creek, Lowland and Mohawk. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 6 and 20. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
